topic.title: Final Project Fair // Computation Party // Demo Day - Thursday morning
topic.text:
Welcome to Week 10 and a celebration of your journey this Fall Quarter.

ILC and DSA students, come one come all to demo your projects,

to enjoy and appreciate the demos of your classmates,

and commune with your community of engineers and programmers.

(Refreshments Provided, No Faculty allowed)

Thursday, Dec 7th, 10am - 12noon

LAB 2617 (our normal classroom)

Sign up for a timeslot on one of the demo computers with your TAs: Winston Shine and Quinn Allen

List of Your Projects to Follow
